TopicTitle: Distance to target visual is gone in 1.11, how to get back?

Articles.Content:
In previous versions if you had an target it would be visible as an small circle and an distance to it. 
This is removed probably because of realism, but wonder if its just hidden by some setting I can not find. 
Its very nice to have then docking.
That feature still exists, but I think you only get the marker and distance if the target is nearby (within 30km?)
